demoAccount.title: Demo Account Setup
demoAccount.description: All participants will receive a demo account with $100,000 virtual capital for trading during the tournament period.

duration.title: Tournament Duration
duration.description: The tournament runs for 30 days, giving traders ample time to demonstrate their strategy and skills.

maxDrawdown.title: Maximum Drawdown
maxDrawdown.description: Traders must maintain drawdown within 10% of initial capital. Exceeding this limit results in automatic disqualification.

finalBalance.title: Final Balance
finalBalance.description: Your final account balance will be the primary metric for ranking.

ruleCompliance.title: Rule Compliance
ruleCompliance.description: Strict adherence to all trading rules and guidelines is mandatory.

additionalMetrics.title: Performance Metrics
additionalMetrics.description: Risk-adjusted returns and consistency will be considered in final rankings.

minimumRequirements.title: Minimum Requirements
minimumRequirements.description: Must complete at least 20 trades during the tournament period.
